word: THE FOLLOWING QUOTATION FROM "EARLY WRITINGS," PP. 40-42, IS OF MUCH SIGNIFICANCE AT THIS TIME, AND OUR PEOPLE MUST HAVE THESE THINGS SET BEFORE THEM IN NO UNCERTAIN WAY. BUT THIS I AM FULLY AWARE OF, THAT THAT WHICH WILL LEAD OUR PEOPLE TO CONTRIBUTE LIBERALLY AS GOD HAS BLESSED THEM, IS THE LOVE OF CHRIST IN THE HEART; THEREFORE SPIRITUAL REVIVAL IS THE MATTER OF FIRST IMPORTANCE:--
